title: Google\Cloud\NetworkConnectivity\V1\PolicyBasedRoute\Filter
name: Filter
description:
Filter matches L4 traffic.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.networkconnectivity.v1.PolicyBasedRoute.Filter

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.ip_protocol
params.description: Optional. The IP protocol that this policy based route applies to. Valid values are 'TCP', 'UDP', and 'ALL'. Default is 'ALL'.

params.name: data.src_range
params.description: Optional. The source IP range of outgoing packets that this policy based route applies to. Default is "0.0.0.0/0" if protocol version is IPv4.

params.name: data.dest_range
params.description: Optional. The destination IP range of outgoing packets that this policy based route applies to. Default is "0.0.0.0/0" if protocol version is IPv4.

params.name: data.protocol_version
params.description: Required. Internet protocol versions this policy based route applies to. For this version, only IPV4 is supported.
